releases.message:
## Added
- Core
  - onResume
- Session
  - isAudioEnabled
  - onAudioStatusChange
  - gameplayStart
  - gameplayStop
  - happyTime


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/compare/v3.0.2...v3.0.3

## What's Changed
### Fixed
- Core
  - Updated for compatibility with Emscripten 3.1.55


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/compare/v3.0.0...v3.0.1

## What's Changed
### BREAKING CHANGE
- Auto initialization has been removed. You must now call Wortal.initializeAsync() and Wortal.startGameAsync() manually to initialize the SDK.

### Added
- Ads
  - New API: showBanner
- Core
  - Achievements API
  - Stats API

### Changed
- Core
  - Upgraded to SDK Core v2


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/compare/v2.4.0...v3.0.0

## What's Changed
### Added
- Core
  - Tournament API
  - Manual initialization option
- Ads
  - isAdBlocked API
- Session
  - getDevice, getOrientation, onOrientationChange, switchGameAsync APIs

### Changed
- Core
  - Upgraded to SDK Core v1.6


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/compare/v2.3.0...v2.4.0

## What's Changed
### Added
- Core
    - Added Notifications API
    - New APIs: getSupportedAPIs, performHapticFeedbackAsync
- Analytics
    - New events: logSocialInvite, logSocialShare, logPurchase, logPurchaseSubscription
- Context
    - New APIs: inviteAsync, shareLinkAsync, isSizeBetween

### Fixed
- Core
  - Exception when passing empty string to js libs

### Changed
- Core
    - Organized api, classes and typedefs


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/compare/v2.2.0...v2.3.0

## What's Changed
### Added
- Ads on Viber
- Group chat context for FB Instant Games
- Game ID parsing for FB Instant Games
- Converter util for FB leaderboards
- Ads API: noFill callback for ad calls
- Context APIs: getType, getPlayersAsync, shareLinkAsync, isSizeBetween
- Player API: flushDataAsync, getASIDAsync, getSignedASIDAsync, canSubscribeBotAsync, subscribeBotAsync
- Session API: getPlatform

### Changed
- Context and Player APIs now have optional null return values to match platform SDKs
- Improved docs
- Improved error handling


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/compare/v2.1.0...v2.2.0

### Added
- Support for FB Instant Games
- onPause callback

### Fixed
- Possible type mismatch for ad unit IDs

## What's Changed
### Breaking Change
- API access is now by module (wortal.ads, wortal.analytics, etc.)

### Added
- Context API
- In-App Purchase API
- Leaderboard API
- Player API
- Session API
- Support for Game Distribution platform
- API use example collections

### Changed
- Extension now uses Wortal SDK Core


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/compare/v1.0.1...v2.0.0

## What's Changed
### Added
- Support for ad blockers

### Fixed
- Possible error on Viber init

## New Contributors
* @trdillon made their first contribution in https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/pull/10

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

### Added
- Initial version of the SDK

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Digital-Will-Inc/wortal-sdk-defold/commits/v1.0.0
